animeDescription: Honoka arrived at home with snacks, juice and candies which are her brother's, named Hirokazu, favorite stuff. However, she noticed there has been an unexpected guest â€“ Akazaki. She attends the same class as Hirokazu and for that matter he invited her for a study session and Honoka misunderstood her as his girlfriend. Will Hirokazu make up with his sister in a secret way while Akazaki is still in their house?Based on the adult manga by Yuzuki N'.(Source: BakaBT, edited)
